Welcome to Spansion FM4

This Webserver runs on a FM4 microcontroller (S6E2CCAL0A) by Spansion, powered by the LwIP (lightweight IP) TCP/IP stack.

Here you see a simple website which has to be reloaded for receiving current data from the microcontroller or sending values to it, respectivelly. You can find an AJAX-based example which updates data in real-time without reloading the whole page here

ADC:


Update Data

For more information, updates, code examples and documentation, please visit our website at http://www.spansion.com/. Below, you see a 338kb large picture of the SK-FM4-216-ETHERNET evaluation board to demonstrate transfer speed.
